value.title: Cutting Through Confusion: The True Value Of AI For Sales Teams
value.excerpt: More top-performing sales reps are jumping ship. Over the last decade, the sales industry has witnessed rep tenure rapidly decline from 3 years in 2010 to a mere 1.5 years in 2019. This trend has only been expedited by the remote world forged by the Covid-19 pandemic.
